messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

LGTM



On Thu, Aug 8, 2013 at 9:51 AM, <pieter@binky.org.uk> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev1,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://code.google.com/p/go
>
>
> Description:
> doc/go1.2.txt: document previously committed features
>
> Please review this at https://codereview.appspot.**com/12585044/<https://codereview.appspot.com/12585044/>
>
> Affected files:
>   M doc/go1.2.txt
>
>
> Index: doc/go1.2.txt
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/doc/go1.2.txt
> +++ b/doc/go1.2.txt
> @@ -12,6 +12,8 @@
>  cmd/cgo, cmd/go: support including C++ code with cgo (CL 8248043).
>  cmd/go: test coverage (CL 10413044).
>
> +container/heap: added Fix (CL 12265043).
> +container/list: added MoveBefore and MoveAfter (CL 12021044).
>  crypto/md5: Sum function to simplify hashing (CL10624044).
>  crypto/sha1: Sum function to simplify hashing (CL 10571043).
>  crypto/sha256: Sum256 and Sum224 functions to simplify hashing (CL
> 10629043).
> @@ -27,6 +29,7 @@
>  image/gif: added Encode and EncodeAll (CL 10896043).
>  io: Copy prioritizes WriterTo over ReaderFrom (CL 9462044).
>  net: new build tag netgo for building a pure Go net package (CL 7100050).
> +runtime: allow SetFinalizer with a func(interface{}) (CL 11858043).
>  runtime: preemption of goroutines at function entry (CL 12371043).
>  sort: new Stable function provides stable sort (CL 9612044).
>  syscall: implemented Sendfile for Darwin, added Syscall9 for Darwin/amd64
> (CL 10980043).
>
>
> --
>
> ---You received this message because you are subscribed to the Google
> Groups "golang-dev" group.
> To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an
> email to golang-dev+unsubscribe@**googlegroups.com<golang-dev%2Bunsubscribe@googlegroups.com>
> .
> For more options, visit https://groups.google.com/**groups/opt_out<https://groups.google.com/groups/opt_out>
> .
>
>
>

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=b22e3e765a1c ***

doc/go1.2.txt: document previously committed features

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/12585044

Committer: Brad Fitzpatrick <bradfitz@golang.org>

subject: code review 12585044: doc/go1.2.txt: document previously committed features
